    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppContext
    Holds shared application-level state for the NTU Internship System.
    Application
    Represents a student's application for an internship opportunity.
    Application.ApplicationStatus
    Represents the status of a student's internship application.
    AuthController
    Controller responsible for handling user authentication.
    CareerStaff
    Represents a Career Staff user in the internship system.
    CareerStaffController
    Controller responsible for handling actions performed by Career Centre Staff.
    CareerStaffView
    Boundary class responsible for handling all user interactions for Career Staff.
    CompanyRep
    Represents a Company Representative user in the internship system.
    CompanyRepController
    Controller responsible for handling all business logic related to Company Representatives.
    CompanyRepCreationReq
    Represents a request submitted by an individual to create a Company Representative account.
    CompanyRepView
    Boundary (UI) class for Company Representatives.
    ComplexityChecker
    Utility class that checks whether a given password meets the system's complexity requirements.
    ConsoleColors
    Utility class that provides ANSI escape codes for printing colored and styled text in the console.
    Filter
    Represents a set of filtering criteria applied to internship opportunities.
    InternshipOpportunity
    Represents an internship opportunity offered by a company in the NTU Internship System.
    InternshipOpportunity.InternshipLevel
    Represents the required experience level for the internship.
    InternshipOpportunity.Major
    Represents the preferred major of students eligible for the opportunity.
    InternshipOpportunity.Status
    Represents the approval status of the internship opportunity.
    InternshipWithdrawalReq
    Represents a student's request to withdraw from an internship they previously applied for.
    InvalidInputException
    Exception thrown when a user provides an invalid or unacceptable input.
    LoadFiles
    Utility class responsible for loading all CSV files into the system's repositories.
    LoginView
    Entry-point view class for handling all login interactions and role-based routing.
    OpportunityRepository
    Repository class that stores and manages all InternshipOpportunity records within the system.
    RequestRepository
    Repository class responsible for storing and managing request-related data, including: CompanyRepCreationReq – Requests for new company representative accounts InternshipWithdrawalReq – Requests from students to withdraw their internship applications
    SaveFiles
    Utility class responsible for saving all in-memory repository data back into their corresponding CSV files.
    Session
    Represents an active user session in the NTU Internship System.
    Student
    Represents a student user in the NTU Internship System.
    StudentController
    Controller responsible for all student-related operations in the internship system.
    StudentView
    Boundary/UI class that manages all interactions between the student user and the application.
    User
    Represents a generic user in the NTU Internship System.
    User.Role
     
    UserDoesntExistException
    Exception thrown when an attempted login or lookup references a user that does not exist in the system.
    UserFactory
    A factory class responsible for constructing User objects based on CSV line input and a specified user role.
    UserRepository
    Repository class responsible for storing and managing all user-related data in the system.
    WrongPasswordException
    Exception thrown when a user enters an incorrect password during authentication.
